and then remeber to check "enable outdated addons" in tghe addons window at the login screen

I have had no problems with this and have been using it for 3 days. Seems like the real deal..

Scanned with Kaspersky and MalwareBytes and looks clean, Tested on retail server works fine,  Thanks for the upload
